snippet: Kraft Heinz said sales fell 4.9 percent at Kraft and 4.1 percent at Heinz in its first quarterly results since the two companies merged.
abstract: Kraft Heinz reports net income of  $551 million in second quarter at its Kraft unit, up from $482 million previous year; Kraft unit reports net revenue of $4.52 billion, down from $4.75 billion in previous year; Heinz unit reports net revenue of $2.62 billion, down from $2.73 billion in previous year; newly combined company cites declining sales.
lead_paragraph: Kraft Heinz said sales fell 4.9 percent at Kraft and 4.1 percent at Heinz in its first quarterly results since the two companies merged.

headline.main: Sales at Heinz and Kraft Fall in First Report After Merger
headline.print_headline: Sales at Heinz and Kraft Fall in First Report After Deal
